name: Lift Off
description:
★ Featured as a New & Noteworthy Game by iTunes Staff! ★ Lift Off into space and navigate your rocket through dangerous obstacles along the way. Create a path of destruction as you shoot through dust, ice, space junk, and an unknown substance called deathonium. Compare your scores with friends on Game Center. Destroy the alien UFO and earn all kinds of great bonuses such as shields, weapon upgrades, and the coveted nuke! How high can you Lift Off?

Features
- Fast action space shooter with game center support
- Shoot your way through dust asteroids, ice crystals, deathonium, and NASA space junk
- Grab bonus items by destroying alien UFOs
- Jump start your games by upgrading your ship with all the bonus items!
- Includes awesome music, sound effects, and stunning graphics

Featuring the music of Schiavone from his solo debut My Only Secret available on the iTunes music store.
http://www.schiavonemcgee.com/

Digitally Recorded at Alpine Red Studio and mixed by Chip Johnson.
http://www.alpinered.com/

Dazzling artwork including backgrounds, fluid ship animations, and space debris crafted by Spark-Flow Studios!
http://www.sparkflowstudios.com/
